page.title: 14BROUGHTON CHILDREN`S GAMES
page.content: WE WENT ROUND THE CLASSES AT SCHOOL TO ASK WHAT GAMES CHILDREN LIKE TO PLAY. HERE IS WHAT WE FOUND GAME CLASS NUMBER 1 2 3 4 5 TOTAL HIDE AND SEEK 0 14 10 23 22 69 TIG 0 17 8 17 11 53 TELEVISIONS 9 19 16 20 16 80 BULL DOG 2 21 17 21 13 74 TIG ON LINES 0 10 15 13 13 51 ICE CREAM 0 4 12 21 17 54 WHATS THE TIME 0 5 0 23 22 50 RELEASE 11 11 2 17 12 53 HOP SCOTCH 0 3 11 20 14 48 KISS CHASE 2 5 3 6 9 25 FOOTBALL 19 16 14 9 16 74 OTHERS 1 0 0 0 9 10 THE MOST POPULAR GAME IS TELEVISIONS. SOME BODY SAYS A T.V. PROGRAMMEÂ£S INITIALS.YOU RUN DOWN TO A LINE AND RUN BACK UP AND SAY WHAT YOU THINK THE PROGRAMME IS.
